name: Police Story: Gangster Game
description:
Play as a police or security officer. Securing your borders should be the top priority! Engage in Various tasks such as criminal car chases, arresting or detaining criminals, guarding the gates, and enforcing rules and regulations. Patrol the border and stop smugglers, terrorists, gangs, and mafia, and be on watch for suspicious activity.
Chase down vehicles & destroy them by crashing. Shoot criminals and mafia in city with different heavy weapons at your disposal. Be on the lookout for dubious activities through security cameras from different angles. Unlock new police cars, weapons, and equipment in Vice Town, the more criminals you catch, the more you play! It’s a race for justice!
Welcome to Police Vice City! Where it all began. Roll up on a dangerous new trip through the city similar San Andreas in Police Story v/s Gangsters today!
Real Gangsters Vice City puts the dark, intriguing and ruthless world of the city’s street crimes on your phones. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles and be the new hero police of Vice Town?
EXPLORE THE CITY ON YOUR FAVORITE POLICE SPORTS CAR

This Police Gangster Games 2018 bring you an opportunity to get yourself in the open streets of city where you can have racing cars from the town. Gangster games or car racing games have one fun common and that is you can car drive everywhere and car park where you want like a boss. In a crimes city you have invaded yourself in fully as law enforcer so now you have to complete some task like chase down the gangsters in City, fight with criminals with Ak-47, machine gun, RPG grenade, MP4 and snipers.

DRIVE AROUND AND ENFORCE LAW IN VICE CITY STREETS

This game brings you to the streets of New Vegas full of gangsters, cops and special force soldiers. Unlock all the weapons and find secrets hidden along the way in Vice Town. Dominate the city with a devastating firepower of advanced military weapons or upgrade new hero powers as you play along the game. Can you complete all the tasks? Stop Gangsters from Killing, robbing, stealing, and destroying things. Shoot your enemies down and tear them apart with heavy artillery. The streets of the city are in turmoil. A war between all the well-known crime families leads the town to self-destruct under insolence, deportation, murder and revenge. You arrive in the town just before the gang war and now it’s your opportunity to stop mafia rise through the ranks of the grand underworld. Real Gangsters are determined to Steal the cars, punch the kingpins and even shoot down the godfathers of Vice Town while gaining notoriety. Play as City Cop to gain control of situation and save town from falling into chaos.

Game Features:
- Visually stunning 3D graphics, insane weapons and crazy vehicle models
- A unique feeling of freedom: enforce law in Gangster Vice Town
- Unique mixer of a shooter and auto mobile racing and car chase!
- Incredible 3D graphics and intuitive touch controls
- Tons of challenging missions comes along as you play
- Multiple weapons and auto vehicles
- High-speed chases and endless gunfights.
- Tricky plot twists.
- Cool cars, military armored special vehicles and much more.
- Hide from the overpowered force of gangsters.
- Rush into the criminal city that never sleeps.
- Many Up-to-date Police cars to unlock while completing modern challenging missions
- Realistic physics based game
- Thrilling & engaging gameplay
The greatest police chase of all the times. You are a number one law enforcer among all the cops in the city. Participate in crazy chases around the Vice town. Be fast and fierce. Don’t hesitate and don’t spare your foes.
